articles.content:

articles.title: James Harden fumes after bizarre final play of ridiculous overtime shootout loss to Portland - Fox Sports
articles.description: If James Harden didn’t want to be a Rockets player, you wouldn’t have been able to tell on Sunday afternoon (AEDT). Well, at least until the final few seconds of his team’s insane overtime clash.
articles.content:
In his first game of the new NBA season, Harden starred during a ridiculous shootout between his Houston Rockets and the Portland Trailblazers, finishing with 44 points and a whopping 17 assists.

articles.title: La Sante's undeniable ability on show at Corowa - Racenet
articles.description: Albury trainer Donna Scott regards four-time winner Oamanikka as her top seed for the 2021 Country Championships but all that could change if La Sante can stake his claim via the last race at Corowa on Monday.
